mapper.delete: delete a from grp_path as a join grp_path as d on a.descendant = d.descendant left join grp_path as x on x.ancestor = d.ancestor and x.descendant = a.ancestor where d.ancestor = #{ancestor,jdbcType=INTEGER} and x.ancestor is null;
mapper.insert: insert into grp_path (ancestor, descendant, deepth) select supertree.ancestor, subtree.descendant, supertree.deepth+subtree.deepth+1 from grp_path as supertree join grp_path as subtree where subtree.ancestor = #{subAncestor,jdbcType=INTEGER} and supertree.descendant = #{superDecendant,jdbcType=INTEGER};
